title: Footballer's Wives - The Complete Series 1-5 plus Extra Time S1-2
description: The complete five series of the ITV drama and both series of its spin-off show, 'Extra Time'. The series follows the eventful on and off pitch antics of the players of the fictional Earls Park FC and their wives and girlfriends aka WAGs. Despite having everything that money, fame and youth afford them, it seems life is never that easy for these footballers and their wives.
